result.reason: Useful UX enhancement to let users exclude specific folders from search results via a per-container boolean property
result.approach: Add an ExcludeFromSearch boolean property to ConnectionInfo (inherited by ContainerInfo). In ConnectionTreeSearchTextFilter.Filter(), skip nodes whose parent container has ExcludeFromSearch=true. Add a right-click context menu item on folders to toggle this flag. Persist the property in the XML/SQL serializers.

attempts.raw_output:
